actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To establish a locally oriented commission to assist the city of Berlin, New Hampshire, in identifying and studying its region's historical and cultural assets, and for other purposes.
short_title: Androscoggin River Valley Heritage Area Act

summary.text: Androscoggin River Valley Heritage Area Act - Establishes the Berlin and the Androscoggin River Valley Heritage Commission to study and report to the Congress, the Secretary of the Interior, and the State of New Hampshire on the Androscoggin River Valley's history and culture in New Hampshire. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Androscoggin River Valley Heritage Area Act
To establish a locally oriented commission to assist the city of Berlin, New Hampshire, in identifying and studying its region's historical and cultural assets, and for other purposes.
